name: wolf-ecs
description: An entity component system framework for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.pub: npm run build && (cp package.json README.md dist; cd dist; npm publish && (cd ../; npm run gh-release))
scripts.gh-release: gh release create $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) dist/*.js dist/*.d.ts -n ""
scripts.build: rm -rf build; tsc; npm run test && (rm -rf dist; rollup -c; npm run min)
